## blockRendering.RenderInfo.shouldStartNewRow\_() method

Decide whether to start a new row between the two Blockly.Inputs.

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected shouldStartNewRow_(currInput: Input, prevInput?: Input): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  currInput | [Input](./blockly.input_class.md) | The current input. |
|  prevInput | [Input](./blockly.input_class.md) | _(Optional)_ The previous input. |

**Returns:**

boolean

True if the current input should be rendered on a new row.
